headline: Brown‑Forman (BF.B): Reassessing Valuation After a 26% One‑Year Share Price Slide
summary: Brown-Forman (BF.B) has quietly slid over the past month, leaving the stock down about 14% and roughly 26% lower over the past year. This performance opens up some valuation questions for long term investors. See our latest analysis for Brown-Forman. That slide comes after a stretch of softer sentiment toward spirits makers, with Brown Forman’s 1 year total shareholder return of around negative 26 percent reflecting concerns that slower volume growth and higher costs could weigh on future...
